properties.title: Anza Borrego - NICE
properties.description: Free Camping on Anza Borrego Park. Nice and was very quiet. Has something away a toilet.  Price: FREE

properties.title: Spencer Hotsprings
properties.description:
Hammer site. Lots of places for vehicle or tent camping with good views.

Three pools, the one in the center can be somewhat adjusted temperature wise.

Roads leading to it are 2wd dirt roads and should be easy unless wet.

properties.title: Burr Trail - NICE
properties.description: Very quiet sleeping places on the Burr Trail to Boulder on a BLM road.

properties.title: Coral Pink Sand Dunes - OK
properties.description: Free camping without nothing in the BLM area. But you can also everywhere else camped nearby!  Price: Free
